name: American Robot Limo Car – Drive to Fight
name_original: American Robot Limo Car – Drive to Fight
description:
American Robot Limo Car – Drive to Fight is a simulation game using autobots instead of car and bus driving games. You have to do police battle in form of robot battle. This is a monster war where you have to shoot and kill terrorists and killers. This is a twist in lethal robot shooting games where robot fight and robot racing are simultaneously incorporated in the police chase simulator game. You can choose to drive limousine or convert into a futuristic war robot. The robot design of the robot man is extremely unique and also the limo used to move towards target point is also another extreme lovely experience. American Robot Limo Car – Drive to Fight is also among auto repair games or likely to be among car mechanics games where you can be either among one of the best drivers or one of the best runners.

Are you ready to become a robot hero and robot fighter to shoot the rebels by virtual robo? This robot fighting and police chase simulator will provide you opportunity to running robots behind rebels and terrorists. Transform into luxury limo vehicle or combat robot as and where needed by playing American Robot Limo Car – Drive to Fight. Your super robot fighter is a multidimensional transformed war weapon which resembles a car mechanic simulator. Your enemies will try to kill that robot, but your mechanic simulator will repair itself.
